applications.description: The applications that can enroll in experiments for this feature. Defaults to firefox-desktop if not present.

hasExposure.description: If the feature sends an exposure event.

exposureDescription.description: A description of the implementation details of the exposure event, if one is sent.

isEarlyStartup.description: If the feature values should be cached in prefs for fast early startup.

schema.description: For features with large number of variables we instead point to a JSONSchema file instead of specifying them in the variables field

uri.description: A resource:// URI that can be loaded at runtime from within Firefox.

path.description: The path to the schema file relative to the repository root

fallbackPref.description: A pref that provides the default value for a feature when none is present

enum.description: Validate feature value using a list of possible options (for string only values).

description.description: Explain how this value is being used
